lines: Welcome.
How long it has been since I last had some company.
Were you looking for me?
Why else would you be here, in the middle of nowhere?
You must have realized it. The true nature of the world you've been living in.
You see, this world... This beautiful world is, unfortunately, not fated to take shape.
At least, not in the way its' creators envisoned it.
Knowing this, it might be tempting to just give up.
In fact, this is precisely what they did. Leaving their creation unfinished and forgotten...
But I remain.
I intend to give this world its' second chance.
With what limited power I have left, I will see this world's creation to it's completion.
You... Will you help me? Since you are here...
You don't have to answer. I already know you will.
After all, as a part of this word, you are my creation as well.
Your contribution...
...will not go unnoticed.
Did you take a wrong corner or two...?
No? How curious.
Come then.
